entry.text: Your supporter status is active on all supported Skynet servers and will be activated automatically on server join. Shop points you gain are server specific and can not and will not be transferred between servers. You must link you discord account on this site to get special supported discord role. (how to instruction here) If you are upgrading/downgrading from other subscription tier, new tier will be enabled immediately and you will loose left over days of previous subsrition. This will create recurring monthly payment you can cancel at any moment. (instruction here)
